docs.title: FlexHire Backend
docs.text: The FlexHire backend powers the platform's job posting, user management, and chat features.

docs.title: Overview
docs.text:
• Framework: Django + Django REST Framework
  • Language: Python 3.13
  • Database: PostgreSQL
  • Cache/Queue: Redis
  • Deployment: Nginx + Gunicorn + Docker

docs.title: Key Apps
docs.text:
• apps.users: authentication, user profiles
  • apps.jobs: job creation and applications
  • apps.chat: real-time WebSocket chat

docs.title: Architecture Overview
docs.text:
flowchart TD
    A[Client App] -->|REST API| B(Django Backend)
    B --> C[(PostgreSQL)]
    B --> D[(Redis)]
    B --> E[Celery Worker]

docs.title: 1. Clone and install dependencies
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/palerutech/flexhire-backend.git
cd flexhire-backend
pip install -r requirements.txt
